data.body: on the table view /bead and in the detail page, you should be able to click on the bead id to copy it.  you should get a notification banner that the id was copied, along with the id.  do not copy the full id value, just the id part (no project prefix)
data.description: on the table view /bead and in the detail page, you should be able to click on the bead id to copy it.  you should get a notification banner that the id was copied, along with the id.  do not copy the full id value, just the id part (no project prefix)
data.title: copiable bead id
